recipe.name: Tortilla Pie
recipe.notes: I had bad recollections about hard, rubbery tortillas with this recipe but I found the recipe de-lish when I finally found the nerve to try it.  I'm not quick to rate something the first time I've made it as a "Favorite", but we're reheating leftovers of it tonight...
recipe.preparation: Brown hamburger and onion together in skillet.  Combine other ingredients (except olives, tortillas and cheese) with meat.  Arrange a layer of tortillas on the bottom of casserole.  Put half of the sauce in a layer and top with chopped olives and grated cheese.  Next put in another layer of tortillas and repeat as above.  Bake at 325F for 30 minutes.
